title: Picking a Dog from the Dog Pound
story: Today we go to the dog pound. What's that dad? It is where we can pick a dog. Really. We're getting a dog? I thought you wanted one Richard. I do dad! Okay. Let's get ready. I'm going to name him Max!
summary: A heartwarming story about a family's visit to the dog pound to pick out a new pet and the excitement of bringing him home.
image: An image of a happy family standing outside the dog pound with a sign that says 'Adopt a Friend Today!'
